title: J.VER Men's Oxford Shirt Solid Casual Button Down Collar Shirts Long Sleeve Dress Shirts with Pocket
description: 100% Cotton: Men's Oxford shirt is made of cotton fabric, which is soft, comfortable, breathable,durable, and still in good condition after repeated washing

Design: 1. button collar-- It's great with or without a tie, but you can do whatever you want. 2. One chest pocket design--The classic design pocket can hold what you need. 3. Adjustable cuff design-- Choose a button position that fits you bette

Size & Color: We provide you with a variety of sizes and colors to meet your different needs. Size of long sleeve button up shirts for men is US standard size. Please choose your pinpoint oxford button down shirt according to the size chart in our picture

Multiple Occasions: Men's shirts are suitable for all seasons, such as spring, autumn and warmer winters. Suitable for multiple occasions, such as work, party, casual, wedding, formal, dress, church, and so on
Customer Service: Any problem about our product, please feel free to contact with us, we will respond and resolve your issues in a timely manner
